entry.title: watching life from the passenger's side
entry.summary:
Author: 404_Sky

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,047Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 1

Summary: It sits in his chest rooting itself behind his ribs and up his throat until it chokes the thoughts and words he's kept buried in his heart out of him. It feels like lead in his bones and pinpricks on his skin and air trapped in his lungs; oppressive and burdensome and ever present. Some days he Doesn't Want To Be Here and by some days he means most days but what other choice does he have? It's not like he can just stop.

entry.title: Fruits of Our Labor
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,798Chapters: 20/?Kudos: 513

Summary: Clark Kent and Bruce Wayne have been dating for a year—quietly, carefully, and very much in love. In public, they’re professional colleagues; in private, Bruce teases and Clark blushes his way through domestic bliss. Meeting the four Wayne sons was nerve-wracking enough, but now Bruce has been acting… off.A “stomach bug,” Clark insists.A “mystery,” Bruce argues.Neither of them expect the doctor’s results that leave Bruce speechless—and Clark ugly crying with joy. Or: a fic about fatherhood, family dinners, a overprotective farmboy, and the world’s most unexpected pregnancy

entry.title: The Dark Knight Before Christmas - A Superbat Year One AU
entry.summary:
Author: EllEmmeCe

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,438Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Gotham is having a very strange Christmas. Bruce Wayne’s latest vigilante experiment, a horned shadowy figure the press has named “Krampus,” was supposed to terrify criminals. Instead, it has gone viral as Gotham’s new holiday mascot. Clark Kent, investigative reporter and part-time baker, is on the case. He is following Krampus’s trail of cookie crumbs (literally) while secretly moonlighting as “Super Santa” to fix Gotham’s holiday chaos. Between gingerbread turtle clues, a viral photo of Krampus tangled in Christmas lights, and Alfred’s endless commentary, Bruce is one bad cape snag away from losing his mind. Meanwhile, Clark is just trying to figure out if Gotham’s scariest new legend is a monster, a myth, or a very grumpy man who needs a hug. It is a holiday season full of crime, cookies, and questionable branding decisions.

entry.title: When Darkness Meets the Light
entry.summary:
Author: YairPL

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,205Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 17

Summary: One year after donning the cowl, Bruce Wayne is no hero. Batman is a specter of vengeance and fury, an unstable project channeling the trauma of a child still screaming in an alleyway. His mission is a self-destructive obsession, and Gotham, a black hole deserving to be purged with fire. Clark Kent, on the other hand, bears the weight of a power he believes he owes to the universe. His invincibility is not a gift, but a shield that must stand before all the pain of others, a cosmic guilt that drives him to save even those who do not want to be saved. When the Daily Planet reporter is assigned to cover Bruce Wayne's charity gala, a clash of ideologies tears away both their masks. Clark sees the deep open wound behind the playboy. Bruce feels for the first time truly seen. This is the story of how light does not always blind the darkness; sometimes, it sits beside it in silence and offers to heal its wounds. It is the journey of two men meeting at the precipice: one learning to be a hero, and the other learning to be human. And from the fragile bridge of understanding they build, the legend will be born.

entry.title: tying me to you
entry.summary:
Author: Areiton

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,702Chapters: 3/24Kudos: 28

Summary: It was a gauntlet, getting here, and now that he is--now that there is nothing to do but watch the vows being said and the Families reacting, now he can second guess himself. It's done. Right or wrong, the decision is made. Peter has a husband, bound to him by magic and blood and, in a few minutes, law. He takes a deep breath and for the first time in a very long time, he considers praying.

entry.title: Do I Wanna Know?
entry.summary:
Author: Deluv_011

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,297Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 274

Summary: Damian Wayne and Conner Kent form an unexpected couple. However, few knew that behind that façade, each of them had their heart burning for someone else. Thus, Damian and Conner cling to each other as a distorted reflection of what they truly long for. Damian yearns for Jon Kent. Conner pines for Tim Drake. And the deeper they fall into that strange relationship, the more they begin to notice certain glances among their teammates… glances that reveal far more than mere friendship.

entry.title: The Protection Agreement
entry.summary:
Author: Nacrestack

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,583Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 182

Summary: Superman has finally had enough. It has been far too long for him to not reveal his identity. When he commits to outing himself to the JL he'll have to contend with the ever cautious Batman. Little does Clark know, Batman isn't nearly as opposed as he seems and Batman might have a secret of his own to share. Too bad everything goes wrong as soon as Batman starts to open up. First it's the media frenzy, then Batman's weird behavior, then Bruce Wayne's ridiculous antics and finally a dangerous villainous plot. Clark is sure he'll never learn more about his best friend after this giant mess.
